results.definition: (used of tobacco) aging as a preservative process (`aged' is pronounced as one syllable)
having attained a specific age; (`aged' is pronounced as one syllable)

examples: special arrangements were available for the aged

results.definition: of wines, fruit, cheeses; having reached a desired or final condition; (`aged' pronounced as one syllable)
advanced in years; (`aged' is pronounced as two syllables)
at an advanced stage of erosion (pronounced as one syllable)
